footer.description: Creating immersive gaming experiences with passion and creativity.

home.heroSubtitle: Crafting immersive fantasy worlds that blend epic storytelling with innovative gameplay
home.offerDescription: Experience gaming like never before with our unique blend of creativity and innovation.
home.immersiveWorldsDesc: Step into beautifully crafted universes with deep lore and stunning visuals.
home.epicGameplayDesc: Experience action-packed adventures with smooth mechanics and engaging combat.
home.communityFirstDesc: Join a passionate community of gamers and creators who shape our journey.

about.title: About Paramita Studio
about.subtitle: We believe that great games come from a balance of creative ambition, clear direction, and respect for the player's experience. Everything we build is made with intention—and made to be enjoyed.
about.missionText: To create memorable gaming experiences that combine engaging gameplay with meaningful storytelling, all while remaining accessible to players everywhere.
about.visionText: To become a trusted indie studio known for delivering quality action-driven games with original worlds and characters that resonate with players.
about.creativityDesc: Pushing boundaries and exploring new ideas in every project we undertake.
about.qualityDesc: Delivering polished experiences that meet high standards, regardless of budget.
about.communityDesc: Building connections with players and fellow creators who share our passion.
about.buildingSubtitle: Action-packed 2D games with strong storytelling at their core.
about.rpgMakerDesc: Using RPG Maker as our foundation, we push far beyond traditional expectations—creating fast-paced action combat, hack-and-slash systems, and experiences ranging from semi-open worlds to tight, story-driven linear adventures.
about.originalUniversesDesc: Every game exists in a fully original universe, with its own lore, characters, and identity. Story is never an afterthought—it shapes gameplay, world design, and player experience.
about.valueProposition: Low price doesn't mean low standards. We apply the same mindset and discipline as large-scale productions—delivering meaningful, high-energy, story-driven games that feel worth far more than their price.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or want to connect? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.getBackSoon: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

faq.q1: What kind of games do you make?
faq.a1: We create 2D action-driven games with a strong emphasis on storytelling and original worlds. Our projects range from semi-open world adventures to linear, narrative-focused experiences, as well as hybrid designs that combine action combat with systems like tower defense.
faq.q2: Why do you use RPG Maker?
faq.a2: RPG Maker is a powerful tool when used to its full potential. We build custom systems, fast-paced action combat, and unique mechanics that go far beyond traditional turn-based RPGs, while remaining efficient and flexible as a small studio.
faq.a3: No. Our games are primarily real-time action-based, including hack-and-slash and action battle systems. Each project is designed around the experience it needs—not a fixed formula.
faq.q4: Why are your games priced so low?
faq.a4: Our pricing reflects our development philosophy, not our quality. By keeping production efficient, we offer complete, polished games at accessible prices—typically between $1 and $3.
faq.q5: Does low price mean short or low-quality games?
faq.a5: No. Most of our games offer at least 3 hours of gameplay. We apply high standards in design, polish, and testing, treating every project with care.
faq.q6: Do you use asset packs or original assets?
faq.a6: We use a combination of community resources, licensed asset packs, and original content, always respecting creators and licenses. Assets are carefully integrated to fit each game's identity.
faq.q7: Are your games connected to each other?
faq.a7: Some may share themes or universes, while others are standalone. Each game is designed to be enjoyable on its own without prior knowledge of our other projects.
faq.q8: What platforms do you develop for?
faq.a8: We primarily focus on PC platforms. Specific platform information is always provided on each game's individual page.
faq.q9: How do you approach quality and testing?
faq.a9: We develop with an AAA mindset at a small scale—iterative design, internal testing, careful balancing, and polishing until the experience feels right.
faq.q10: Do you plan to expand beyond RPG Maker?
faq.a10: We're open to new tools if they help deliver better experiences. However, our focus remains on making great games—the tool is a means, not the goal.
